User instruction: 创建新文档并添加标题"绩效考核标准"，添加页眉显示"人力资源部"。
Feasible API sequence: create_and_save_docx(doc_path, "");add_heading(doc_path, "绩效考核标准", level=1);add_header(doc_path, "人力资源部");

User instruction: 添加二级标题"考核指标"、"考核方法"和"考核周期"。
Feasible API sequence: add_heading(doc_path, "考核指标", level=2);add_heading(doc_path, "考核方法", level=2);add_heading(doc_path, "考核周期", level=2);

User instruction: 在"考核指标"下插入一个5行4列的表格。
Feasible API sequence: add_table(doc_path, 5, 4);set_cell_text(table, 0, 0, "考核项目");set_cell_text(table, 0, 1, "权重");set_cell_text(table, 0, 2, "评分标准");set_cell_text(table, 0, 3, "得分");

User instruction: 在"考核方法"下添加带编号的列表项。
Feasible API sequence: add_list_item(doc_path, "自评", style="List Number");add_list_item(doc_path, "主管评价", style="List Number");add_list_item(doc_path, "360度评估", style="List Number");
